comms.explainPushNotifications: This lets us send you a push notification if you receive a new message or if there's an important update.
comms.feedbackExplainer: We appreciate any feedback, bug reports, ideas, issues, testimonials, or success stores. How can we improve the app? What questions can we answer? Tell us!
comms.joinUsOnSocials: Join us on the old social platforms we haven't replaced yet
comms.toJoin: To join Arcade City, get an invite from a friend!

guild.charterAdd: Add your guild charter to document how payments, issues, and feedback will be handled.
guild.charterExplainer1: Here is the charter from our first guild, Arcade City Austin. You can use this as a template for your own charter.
guild.charterExplainer2: Arcade City Austin has provided reliable citywide service since May 2016, organizing primarily through Facebook. Their charter reflects more than two years of lessons learned while operating the world's first self-governing rideshare network. Lots to learn from!
guild.charterExplainer3: Note that some provisions are specific to organizing requests on Facebook and will need to be modified for use with our mobile app.
guild.charterExplainer4: A charter is a list of policies describing how that guild handles driver vetting, rider complaints, regulatory compliance, and more. As an example, you can view the charter of our Arcade City Austin network here:
guild.explainer1: Guilds are teams of Arcade City players who work together to provide reliable service to their local area.
guild.explainer2: Drivers and other service providers wanting to accept in-app card payments must be in a chartered guild.
guild.explainer3: Will you join a guild or create your own?
guild.guildBeaconExplainer: This will be visible globally. If you want it in a different location, move to another area and log in again to the app.
guild.guildClosestYou: Here are the guilds closest to you.
guild.invitedToJoin: You have been invited to join:
guild.invitedToJoin2: You have been invited to join
guild.invitedToJoin3: {{leader}} has invited you to join the guild {{guild}}
guild.toInviteMembers: To invite members, your charter must be approved by City Hall. Email us your draft charter: cityhall@arcade.city
guild.viewCharterFor: Here you can view the charter for {{guild}}
guild.viewCharterExplainer1: Here you can view the charter for
guild.viewCharterExplainer2: Note: this charter is hosted online at the following link and is subject to change.
guild.viewCharterExplainer3: Every Arcade City guild has a charter specifying their policies. You can always read a guild's charter and decide whether you are comfortable interacting with that guild.

onboarding.enableLocationExplainer1: The app needs your location to connect you with nearby users.
onboarding.enableLocationExplainer2: Your city will be shared on your public profile, for example 'Austin, TX, US'.
onboarding.enableLocationExplainer3: Your exact location will not be shared publicly unless you create a map beacon.
onboarding.riderOrDriver: Are you a rider or driver?
onboarding.setBioExplainer: Enter the bio for your public profile
onboarding.setUsernameExplainer: Enter the username for your public profile
onboarding.termsAgree: I agree to the Terms of Service.
onboarding.termsExplainer: By using Arcade City, you agree to our Terms of Service.
onboarding.terms2: 2) You will treat every fellow Arcade City member with respect.
onboarding.terms3: 3) You will comply with your local laws and regulations.
onboarding.terms4: 4) You take full responsibility for your actions and consequences of your actions. Any issues you have with fellow users you will resolve with them directly or through your guild.
onboarding.termsWarn: Any violations may result in a lifetime ban.

service.addRequestDetailsExplainer: Tell your driver anything they should know
service.cancelConfirmAreYouSure: Are you sure? You may be penalized for excessive cancellations.
service.confirmDriverExplainer: {{username}} will see your request addresses and begin service.
service.insufficientAddress: Insufficient address info to render request
service.pickupTooFar: The pickup address is too far from your current location.
service.placeholderFare: For now you will negotiate fare with your driver.
service.placeholderPayments: In-app card payments will be supported in an upcoming version. For now you can negotiate payment options with your driver.
service.placeholderSchedule: You will be able to schedule future rides in an upcoming version. For now just work out the details with your driver directly.
service.requestExplainer: We send your request to nearby drivers. They will send a message if they can take your request. Select your driver and they will receive the addresses you entered.
service.resolveYourRequestExplainer: Your request was completed and service is no longer needed?
service.unselectDriverExplainer: {{username}} will be notified they were removed from the request.
service.upcomingFeatureRequestDrivers: In an upcoming version you will have the option to send requests directly to a specific driver or guild.
